definitions.definition: To seem to perceive things (with one or more of one's senses ) which are not really present; to have visions ; to experience a hallucination .
To produce information that is not supported by the model's training data.

main_definition: ( ambitransitive ) To seem to perceive things (with one or more of one's senses ) which are not really present; to have visions ; to experience a hallucination .
secondary_definitions: ( artificial intelligence , of a model ) To produce information that is not supported by the model's training data.
